API¶

Full Api Documentation

DB Namespace Wrappers¶

class rpw.db_wrappers.BaseElementWrapper(element)¶

Bases: rpw.db_wrappers.BaseWrapper

Base Element Wrapper Class Initializes using a Revit Element. This element is stored in the projected _element attribute :param element: Revit Element to store :type element: APIObject

Note

There might are few cases were this class is used on non-elements. ParameterSet for instance, does not inherit from Element, but uses this class so it can store a reference to the element and uses other Parameter related methods that are not store in Parameters such as element.get_Parameter or element.LookupParameter

__init__(element)¶

Child classes can use self._element to refer back to Revit Element Element is used loosely to refer to all Revit Elements.

class rpw.db_wrappers.BaseWrapper¶

Bases: object

Base Object Wrapper Class. Does not require any arguemnts. Allows access to all original attributes and methods of original object.

__getattr__(attr)¶

Access original methods and properties or the element.

__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)

class rpw.db_wrappers.Element(element)¶

Bases: rpw.db_wrappers.BaseElementWrapper

Generic Revit Element Wrapper

Usage:

>>> wall = Element(RevitWallElement)
>>> wall.id
>>> wall.parameters['Height']

class rpw.db_wrappers._Parameter(element)¶

Bases: rpw.db_wrappers.BaseElementWrapper

Revit Element Parameter Wrapper.

Handles the following types:

  • Autodesk.Revit.DB.StorageType.String
  • Autodesk.Revit.DB.StorageType.Double
  • Autodesk.Revit.DB.StorageType.ElementId
  • Autodesk.Revit.DB.StorageType.Integer
  • Autodesk.Revit.DB.StorageType.None
__repr__()¶

Adds data to Base __repr__ to add selection count

type¶

Results the Python Type of the Parameter

returns: python built in type

value¶

Get Parameter Value :returns: parameter value in python type :rtype: type

Usage:
>>> desk.parameter['Height'].value
>>> 3.0

Set Parameter Value

Usage:
>>> desk.parameter['Height'].value = 3

Note

Certain types are automatically coerced

  • storagetype:value > result
  • str:None > ‘’
  • str:type > str(value)
  • ElementId:None > ElemendId.InvalidElementId
  • int:float > int
  • float:int > float
class rpw.db_wrappers._ParameterSet(element)¶

Bases: rpw.db_wrappers.BaseElementWrapper

Revit Element Parameter List Wrapper. Allows you to treat an element parameters as if it was a dictionary.

__getitem__(param_name)¶

Get’s parameter by name.

returns: the first parameter found with a matching name (wrapper), or None if there is no matching parameters.

__init__(element)¶

Setup element

__repr__()¶

Adds data to Base __repr__ to add Parameter List Name

class rpw.transaction.Transaction(name)¶

Bases: object

Transaction Context Manager.

Simplifies transactions by applying Transaction.Start() and Transaction.Commit before and after the context. Automatically rolls back if exception is raised.

Usage:
>>> with Transaction('Move Wall'):
>>>     wall.move()
__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object (if defined)
